archimate:BusinessRole.name: Swedish Society Cybersecurity Promotor
archimate:BusinessRole.documentation:
The swedish public authorities in this assignment have key areas of responsibility and tasks in promoting information and cyber security in the society. They also have a well-established collaborative culture via the interagency Cooperation Group for Information Security (SAMFI)
Comprehensive Information and Cyber Security Action Plan for the years 2019â€“2022: https://rib.msb.se/filer/pdf/29256.pdf Interagency Group Collaboration: https://www.informationssakerhet.se/om-informationssakerhet2/samverkansgruppen-for-informationssakerhet/
